data.name: Mixture
data.description:
Mixture is a fantasy action-adventure in which two enemies in an alliance of necessity traverse barren worlds in a quest for redemption. In this dual character control game, you alternate between playing as the master alchemist Sephairos and exiled knight Sola, in both first and third person perspectives. 🧙‍♂️🦋 As an odd couple, you must platform, mix materials, cast and melee, solve puzzles, and defeat giant bosses to survive this atmospheric tale!

Mixtures main features:

Mix and Slash  🧪⛏️  - action adventure gameplay combining the two characters unique skills

Dual character control 🧙‍♂️🦋  - control both the Alchemist Sephairos and the Steel Moth Knight Sola 

Explore the Wastelands  🗺️  - journey through hand crafted dangerous barren lands of living metals, ores and crystals 

Fight for the light  ✨ - Oversized bosses to defeat on your path of redemption

Hours of exploration  ⏳🌎  - Four unique biomes and more than 30 levels

An action adventure for standalone VR  🥽  - Hybrid third person camera and fixed camera movement for hours of comfortable exploration in the Wastelands.

translations.long_description:
《融合》是一款奇幻类动作冒险游戏，讲述了本该是宿敌的二人在不得已之下结盟并横跨整个贫瘠世界、寻求救赎的故事。在这款协作游戏中，你将在炼金大师塞费洛斯和放逐骑士索拉这两个角色之间切换（支持第一人称和第三人称视角）。为了在这波澜壮阔的故事中生存，🧙‍♂️🦋这对罕见的二人组必须身怀绝技：融合材料、施展法术、肉搏、解谜、击败巨型Boss！
 
 🧪⛏️ 炼金&战斗：结合了两位角色独有技能的动作冒险玩法
 
 🧙‍♂️🦋 单人双角色玩法：玩家将操控炼金术士塞费洛斯和“飞蛾”骑士索拉两位角色
 
 🗺️ 探索荒原：穿越精心打造的，充满活体金属、矿石和水晶且危险重重的贫瘠大地
 
 ✨ 为“天光”而战：打败拦在你救赎之路上的巨型Boss
 
 ⏳🌎 值得数小时的探索：四个地图，超过30个关卡
 
 🥽 为VR一体机准备的动作冒险游戏：支持混合第三人称视角与固定视角，为你在荒原数个小时的探索提供舒适体验

translations.long_description:
"Mixture est un jeu d'action-aventure dans un monde de fantasy où deux ennemis contraints de faire alliance traversent des terres arides dans leur quête de rédemption. Vous incarnerez tour à tour l'expert alchimiste Sephairos et la chevaleresse exilée Sola, respectivement à la 1re et à la 3e personne. 🧙‍♂️🦋 Ce duo étrange devra traverser des plateformes, mélanger des matériaux, les lancer, combattre au corps-à-corps, résoudre des énigmes, et affronter de gigantesques boss !
 
 🧪⛏️ Concoctez des mélanges et tranchez vos ennemis : Vos deux personnages disposent de compétences uniques
 
 🧙‍♂️🦋 Contrôlez l'alchimiste Sephairos et la phalène d'acier Sola
 
 🗺️ Partez à l'aventure : voyagez à travers des terres stériles riches en métaux et cristaux
 
 ✨ Combattez pour la lumière : affrontez des boss gigantesques pour obtenir la rédemption
 
 ⏳🌎 Des heures d'exploration : quatre biomes uniques et plus de 30 niveaux
 
 🥽 Un jeu destiné à la VR : une caméra hybride qui permet de jouer des heures.
translations.short_description: Mixture est un jeu d'action-aventure dans un monde de fantasy où deux ennemis contraints de faire alliance traversent des terres arides dans leur quête de rédemption. Vous incarnerez tour à tour l'expert alchimiste Sephairos et la chevaleresse exilée Sola, respectivement à la 1re et à la 3e personne. 🧙‍♂️🦋 Ce duo étrange devra traverser des plateformes, mélanger des matériaux, les lancer, combattre au corps-à-corps, résoudre des énigmes, et affronter des boss gigantesques pour survivre!

translations.long_description:
Mixture는 원래는 적이지만 필요에 의해 동맹 관계를 맺어야 하는 두 명이 척박한 세상에서 구원을 위한 모험을 떠나는 판타지 액션 어드벤처 게임입니다. 이 셀프 협동 게임 속에서 당신은 마스터 연금술사인 세파이로스와 추방당한 기사 솔라를 1인칭과 3인칭 시점으로 번갈아 가며 플레이하게 됩니다. 🧙‍♂️🦋당신은 어울리지 않는 이 콤비와 함께 전진하고, 재료를 섞고, 마법을 시전하고, 공격하고, 퍼즐을 풀고, 거대한 보스를 물리치면서 이 기묘한 이야기 속에서 살아남아야 합니다!
 
 🧪⛏️ 섞고 베어버리세요 - 두 캐릭터 고유의 스킬을 결합한 액션 어드벤처 게임 플레이
 
 🧙‍♂️🦋 셀프 협동 게임 플레이 - 연금술사 세파이로스와 강철 나방 기사 솔라를 모두 조종하세요
 
 🗺️ 황무지를 탐험하세요 - 살아있는 금속, 광석, 크리스탈로 가득한 위험천만하고 척박한 땅을 여행하세요
 
 ✨ 빛을 위해 싸우세요 - 거대한 보스들이 등장하여 구원을 위한 당신의 여정을 저지하려고 할 겁니다
 
 ⏳🌎 탐험의 시간 - 네 가지 생물군계와 30개가 넘는 레벨
 
 🥽 독립형 VR 액션 어드벤처 - 황무지에서 오랜 시간 동안 탐험해도 편안할 수 있도록 3인칭 카메라와 고정 카메라 이동을 결합한 하이브리드 게임 플레이.

translations.long_description:
Mixture es una aventura de acción y fantasía en la que dos enemigos, obligados a formar una alianza por necesidad, buscan la redención recorriendo mundos inhóspitos. Juega como el maestro Alquimista Sephairos y la Caballera exiliada Sola, en 1ª y 3ª persona. 🧙♂️🦋 Esta peculiar pareja vive una evocadora historia en la que debe superar plataformas, mezclar ingredientes, lanzarlos, luchar cuerpo a cuerpo, resolver puzles y derrotar a jefes gigantescos.
 
 🧪⛏️ Crea mixturas y acuchilla a tus enemigos: combina las excepcionales habilidades de los dos personajes
 
 🧙‍♂️🦋 Alterna entre dos personajes: controla al Alquimista Sephairos y a la Polilla Sola
 
 🗺️ Disfruta de la aventura: atraviesa mundos dibujados a mano llenos de metales, minerales y cristales
 
 ✨ Lucha a favor de la Luz: derrota a los enormes jefes y obtén la redención
 
 ⏳🌎 Explora durante horas: 4 biomas únicos y más de 30 niveles
 
 🥽 Una aventura de acción para RV: con cámara híbrida en 3ª persona y movimiento de cámara fija
translations.short_description: Mixture es una aventura de acción y fantasía en la que dos supuestos enemigos, obligados a formar una alianza por necesidad, buscan la redención atravesando mundos inhóspitos. Juega como el maestro Alquimista Sephairos y la Caballera exiliada Sola, en primera y tercera persona. 🧙♂️🦋 Esta peculiar pareja vive una evocadora historia en la que, para sobrevivir, debe superar plataformas, mezclar ingredientes, lanzarlos, luchar cuerpo a cuerpo, resolver puzles y derrotar a jefes gigantescos.

translations.long_description:
Mixture è un gioco d’azione-avventura fantasy in cui due nemici costretti a un’alleanza esplorano mondi desolati in cerca di redenzione. Alternandoti tra il maestro alchimista Sephairos e il cavaliere esiliato Sola, 🧙‍♂️🦋 in prima e in terza persona, ti destreggerai tra piattaforme, miscele, incantesimi, scontri in mischia, rompicapi e boss titanici in un racconto di grande atmosfera!
 
 🧪⛏️ Miscele e fendenti - Uno stile di gioco d’azione e avventura che combina le abilità dei personaggi
 
 🧙‍♂️🦋 Gioco auto-cooperativo - Controlla l’Alchimista Sephairos e Sola, la Falena d’Acciaio
 
 🗺️ Esplora le terre desolate - Viaggia in terre brulle e pericolose tra metalli viventi, minerali e cristalli
 
 ✨ Combatti per la luce - Sconfiggi boss giganteschi lungo la strada che porta alla redenzione
 
 ⏳🌎 Ore di esplorazione - Quattro biomi unici e più di 30 livelli
 
 🥽 Azione-avventura per RV stand-alone - Visuale ibrida in 3a persona e movimento fisso della visuale per comode ore di esplorazione.
translations.short_description: Mixture è un gioco d’azione-avventura fantasy in cui due nemici costretti a un’alleanza esplorano mondi desolati in cerca di redenzione. In questo gioco auto-cooperativo ti alterni tra il maestro alchimista Sephairos e il cavaliere esiliato Sola, in prima e in terza persona. 🧙‍♂️🦋Questa strana coppia si destreggerà tra piattaforme, miscele, incantesimi, scontri in mischia, rompicapi e boss titanici in un racconto di grande atmosfera!

translations.long_description:
『Mixture』は必要に迫られて手を結んだかつての仇敵2人が、自らの名誉を取り戻すために荒れ果てた世界を横断していくファンタジーアクションアドベンチャーです。この連携型ソロプレイゲームでは、一人称視点と三人称視点の双方で、老獪な錬金術師セファイロスと、放逐された騎士ソーラとして交互にプレイしていくことになります。🧙‍♂️🦋 この風変わりな二人組が、この独特の雰囲気のある物語の結末を目指していくためには、様々な地形を乗り越え、素材を混ぜ合わせ、呪文のキャストと近接攻撃を使いこなし、パズルを解き、巨大なボスを倒さなければなりません！
 
 🧪⛏️ 《混合》し、切り伏せろ！ ― 2人のキャラクターのユニークなスキルを組み合わせる、アクションアドベンチャーゲーム
 
 🧙‍♂️🦋 連携型ソロプレイ ― 錬金術師セファイロスと《毒蛾の騎士》ソーラの両方を操作
 
 🗺️ 荒野を探索 ― 金属、鉱石、クリスタルそれぞれに不思議な生命が宿る、危険な不毛の地を旅しよう
 
 ✨ 光のための戦い ― 名誉を回復するための旅で、行く手に立ちはだかる複数の巨大ボス
 
 ⏳🌎 何時間もの探索 ― 4つのユニークなワールド、30以上のステージ
 
 🥽 スタンドアローンVRアクション アドベンチャー ― サードパーソンカメラと固定カメラのハイブリッド の動きで、荒れ果てた世界をで何時間も快適に探索できます。

translations.long_description:
Mixture ist ein Fantasy-Action-Adventure, in dem zwei Erzfeinde ein Zweckbündnis eingehen und gemeinsam die Ödlande auf der Suche nach Erlösung durchstreifen. In diesem „Einzel-Koop“ spielst du in Ego- und 3rd-Person-Perspektive gleichzeitig als der Alchemist Sephairos und die verbannte Ritterin Sola.🧙‍♂️🦋Gemeinsam mit diesem ungleichen Paar musst du Plattformer-Elemente überwinden, Materialien kombinieren, zaubern, kämpfen, Rätsel lösen und riesige Bosse bezwingen!
 
 🧪⛏️ Mix & Slash: Action-Adventure, das einzigartige Charakter-Skills kombiniert
 
 🧪⛏️ Einzel-Koop: Spiele gleichzeitig den Alchemisten Sephairos und die Stahlmotte Sola
 
 🗺️ Erkunde die Ödlande: Streife durch die handgezeichneten, gefährlichen Lande voller Metalle, Erze und Kristalle
 
 ✨ Kämpfe für das Licht: Auf deinem Weg zur Erlösung werden dir mehrere gigantische Bosse begegnen
 
 ⏳🌎 Viel zu entdecken: Vier einzigartige Gebiete und über 30 Level
 
 🥽 Ein Action-Adventure für Standalone-VR: Hybride 3rd-Person-Kamera und fixe Kamerabewegungen für Stunden voller komfortabler Erkundung in den Ödlanden

changelog.change_log:
Changes:
1. Gameplay
Added new particle on Sola to show dash ability cooldown and reset
Added specific locations where it’s easier to get Sola react to players touch:
Mortars, Laboratory, Deep Wild, Skyward Paths, Crossroads, Riddle Dark, Aqueduct, Dam & Pier and Canyon
Added better logic at the end of Aqueduct (rescuing Zep from the rust)
Automatic checkpoint after connecting the second crystal in Crown Riddle level
Fixed general issue with magnets being active despite objects blocking their flow
Fixed rusted walls positions in Idol Up, that could cause Sola to die in a safe spot
Fixed issue with lost input in Crater
Fixed issue with lost input during climbing in Idol Down
Nerfed specific jumppad in Crossroads, that propelled Sola to high

2. Player Guidance
Added guiding light effect at the end of Prison level
Tweaked crackwalls and resources positions in Pier Boss to make the winning strategy more clear
Improved path and danger zones visibility in Pit Boss level
Added a new shortcut portal to the Laboratory entrance near the HUB in Crossroads
Changed Regrow tooltip position and added a new section at the end of the slide for learning purposes in Crossroads

3. Combat
Updated arenas to be more varied in:
Laboratory, Slope Down, Riddle Dark and Barge Fight levels
Tentacles now correctly work with Reflect mixture
Bouncer auras and enemy spawners are now included in 1st arena in Slope Down
Added an extra line between Sola and an enemy hit by Reflect mixture to improve laser visibility

4. Interface
Added customizable parameters for smooth turning:
Vignette Strength and Rotation Speed
Tweaked menu options colliders to be more precise

5. Visuals
Updated rust to look rustier
Removed black particles when returning to Crossroads after finishing Pit Boss level
Rust on the elevator in Aqueduct is now correctly visible in both states
Updated barge magnet effects in Aqueduct
The glue zone now disappears after 2nd phase of Peak Boss
Fixed levitating rust in Dam & Pier
Tweaked blades position in Barge Fight level
Crackwall near HUB removed from Crossroads
Conclave floating building is now at proper height to be visible from camera


6. Balance changes
Increased Conclave Boss HP Regeneration Interval
Extended duration of rust regeneration on climbable walls in Pit Boss

7. Optimization
Magnet effect optimizations

8. Minor fixes
Tweaked wind position in Crossroads
Tweaked grab area size in Deep Wild for easier access
Hidden target Auto-Aim icon is no longer showing up through the wall in Caverns
Tweaked tooltip text formatting in Prison, Canyon and Crater levels
Updated VO in Dam & Pier, Aqueduct and The Hive levels
Tweaked collider on the rock near 1st arena in Dam & Pier
Added additional collisions within the portal from Laboratory in Mortars

Patch notes and thank-yous

Hello everyone! First of all, we want to say thank you for the warm reception of Mixture! Since we released the game one week ago things have been crazy, with hundreds of comments, posts and reviews. Overall you seem to be really enjoying the adventures of Sola and Sephairos, which is fantastic! However, as always in games, there are things that can be improved.
The one thing we’ve been wanting to fix and which many of you have expressed some frustration about, is the first boss – the snake boss in the tutorial. Therefore, we’ve tweaked that passage quite a lot (details below). We’ve also implemented various quality of life fixes and erased a lot of minor bugs.
We hope you enjoy Mixture, and we’ll of course continue polishing the experience as we go along. If you want to discuss the game or get to know other players – and us! – please jump in on our Discord server and follow us on our other channels.

Thanks again, and see you soon!

Discord: http://discord.gg/SjpgMekCeS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MixtureVr
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MixtureVR
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mixturevr/
Website: https://www.playedwithfire.com/mixture/

Patch notes
-Tutorial area boss tweaks
-Boss is easier to surprise and trap in the first phase
-Boss visual attack-signaling is more precise in timing and range
-Mixture vials now bounce off the boss’s head
-Boss fight pauses briefly when tooltip is shown
-Winds positions adjusted for comfort and visibility

General fixes
-Language settings now default to your headset settings
-Issue of missing initial checkpoint when teleporting through Beams of Bast fixed
-Mumbling sounds of the Depths Boss are now heard on every stage of the fight
-Comfort of going down the Crossroads slide tweaked
-Changing aim assist settings now also works from the pause menu
-Shake ability is no longer lost if you die too soon after receiving it
-"Living bullets" tutorial has been updated for comfort
